Posts.Content: My feet and ankles stay swollen most of the time and the skin even hurts.My joints and bones hurt from my knees down,not able to sleep but no hot flashes so far.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: On Apr 24, 2012 2:09 PM pipperpain wrote: i am on arimidex have mentioned to the onc that i was having alot of bone pain, it is a side efffect for sure.  I often find myself wondering if the pain is from the arimidex or from the cancer that is also growing in my bones.  It has left me feling so weak in my legs that i depend on my arm strength to pull me up.  Anyone else feeling this wat? If I set more than five minutes I need help getting up,My arms hurt so much from pushing my self up,I think maybe I will get a lift chair.I can stand the pain but what hurts is not being able to go places as my feet stay swollen and hurt to stand on them for any lenght of time. I wonder how many more has these same problems, I would like to know as it may help me make amdecision.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years
